  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/525</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/525</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Clever consumers investigate detergents</string>
            <string language="en">Clever consumers investigate detergents</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gescheite Verbraucher forschen Reinigungsmittel 
nach</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les consommateurs intelligents étudient des 
détergents</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os consumidores inteligentes investigam 
detergentes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I consumatori intelligenti studiano i detersivi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι έξυπνοι καταναλωτές ερευνούν τα απορρυπαντικά</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Crèdit integrat per a treballar conjuntament les àrees de Ciències de la naturalesa i Llengües estrangeres. Els continguts són de ciències en anglès. Conté  les activitats i pràctiques de laboratori per imprimir (Sinera 2000).</string>
            <string language="en">Integrated credit to work on natural science and foreign language with the scientific content in English. It includes printable instructions for activities and laboratory practice.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació per al consum</string>
            <string language="en">consumer education</string>
            <string language="es">educación para el consumo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació transversal</string>
            <string language="en">cross-curricular education</string>
            <string language="es">educación transversal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">multilingüisme</string>
            <string language="en">multilingualism</string>
            <string language="es">multilingüismo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">material didàctic</string>
            <string language="en">teaching materials</string>
            <string language="es">material didáctico</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Integrierte Gutschrift, zum auf natürlicher 
Wissenschaft und Fremdsprache mit dem wissenschaftlichen Inhalt auf 
englisch zu arbeiten. Er schließt bedruckbare Anweisungen für 
Aktivitäten und Laborpraxis ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Degré de solvabilité intégré à travailler sur la science
normale et la langue étrangère avec le contenu scientifique en 
anglais. Il inclut des instructions imprimables pour des 
activités et la pratique en matière de laboratoire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crédito integrado a trabalhar na ciência 
natural e na língua extrangeira com o índice científico em inglês.
Inclui instruções printable para atividades e prática do 
laboratório.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Accreditamento integrato da lavorare a scienza 
naturale ed alla lingua straniera con il contenuto scientifico in 
inglese. Include le istruzioni stampabili per le attività e la 
pratica del laboratorio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενσωματωμένη πίστωση για να εργαστεί στη φυσική 
επιστήμη και την ξένη γλώσσα με το επιστημονικό περιεχόμενο στα 
αγγλικά. Περιλαμβάνει τις εκτυπώσιμες οδηγίες για τις 
δραστηριότητες και την εργαστηριακή πρακτική.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbraucherausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kreuzlehrplanausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mehrsprachigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehrmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation du consommateur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation croix-curriculaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">multilinguisme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">matériel didactique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução do consumidor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">multilingualism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">materiali didattici</string>
          </keyword>
